description:
Ratco has set up a sheep station in the Australian Outback, but things are not running smoothly. Rat 1 is fired and replaced by an ambitious female rat. He will not take no for an answer, and he plots to get rid of her by burning down the station, threatening the local wildlife, including the Burrowing Bettongs. The Bamboo Bears come to their rescue when they discover the world`s biggest fire extinguisher!
Source: bcdb.com
